title: Drifting in Antarctica
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Human Services, funding
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hearing impaired
abstract: "A living dream. I can't believe I'm here".
description: Alice, a profoundly deaf Zoologist, tells of her experience as a volunteer seabird observer on a working icebreaker in Antarctica. Featuring excerpts from "The rime of the ancient mariner" by Samuel Taylor Coleridge. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.
